textBeforeTable: Dimensions: Cloth Draw String Bag. Free Head Wrap (Valued At $5.95). ALSO INCLUDES Soft Touch, Dull Black Finish. Nickel Plated Rolled Tubular Steel Rivets. Nylon Y-Strap D-Ring Retention System With Sliding Adjuster. Moisture Wicking Fabric Keeps Your Head Cooler And More Comfortable. Meets And Exceeds D.O.T. Safety Standards FMVSS 218. Reviews Dimensions Details Our D.O.T. Daytona German Helmet In The Soft Touch, Dull Black Finish, Meets And Exceeds D.O.T. FMVSS 218 Standards.  It Is Also Available In Hi-Gloss Black.  Free Head Wrap And Cloth Draw String Bag Included.  Sizes Range From XS-XL. textAfterTable: Click Here for a Sizing Chart GERMAN- DULL BLACK   I bought one in Oct. and really like it. I had 3 cheap helmets I bought off a well know internet site and ended up selling 2 of them and kept one just for emergencies. Its light and made really good, in fact, better than some costing much more and the woman that waited on me was very friendly and most helpful, nice to look at too. If this is the style of helmet you�re looking for, go no farther, you will like this one. -- Steve German Helmet   Over all the D.O.T. German style helmet looks and feels great.....
